name: The Legend of the Kingdom of Fantasy
name_original: The Legend of the Kingdom of Fantasy
description:
Overview

The Legend of the Kingdom of Fantasy was developed for the level design course at the University of Baltimore. Our level consists of solving a puzzle by examining clues around a throne room and escaping the Kingdom of Ophelia without getting caught by the searchlights roaming the labyrinth. 

Story

Once upon a time in The Legend of the Kingdom of Fantasy.

You find yourself in the throne room trapped with no way to escape. The king is on their way to hand down your sentence for trespassing into their land.

You hear a soft voice whisper into your head.

"Do not fret my friend. There is a way to escape and secure your freedom. You must find a way to open the game that leads to the Labyrinth. Once there you can solve the labyrinth to find your freedom. Be wary, the king is close and your time is limited. Use the clues hidden around the throne room to solve the puzzles to open the gate".

"Look for a book of spells to start you on this path. The keys shall guide you. I am sorry I cannot give you more my friend, be quick and be safe!"

The voice fades and you realize you don't have time to think. It is time to make your escape!

Controls

WASD = Movement

Spacebar = Jump

Shift = Run

Technical Art: Crystal Derrow

Programming: Jason R. Somrajit

Music- Tissot, Benjamin. "Sad Day". Bensound
